original_text: And she made him sleep upon her knees; and she called for a man, and she caused him to shave off the seven locks of his head; and she began to afflict him, and his strength went from him.
korean_text: 들릴라가 삼손에게 자기 무릎을 베고 자게 하고 사람을 불러 그의 머리털 일곱 가닥을 밀고 괴롭게 하여 본즉 그의 힘이 없어졌더라

sentences.original_text: And she made him sleep upon her knees
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그를 자기 무릎에 잠들게 했다

sentences.original_text: and she called for a man
and she caused him to shave off the seven locks of his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 그에게 그의 머리의 일곱 가닥 머리카락을 밀게 했다

sentences.original_text: and she began to afflict him
and his strength went from him
